title: 'Chinese stole secrets' and 'Andrew, Epstein and me'

title: Hamas says all reachable hostage bodies recovered amid Israel threat to resume Gaza fighting
description: Israel’s defence minister has said the country could resume fighting if Hamas does not honour the terms of the ceasefire deal

title: Government publishes key witness statements in collapsed China spy case
description: Deputy national security adviser concluded China was "highly capable and conduct large-scale espionage operations against the UK".
content:
The government's deputy national security adviser warned in 2023 that China was carrying out "large scale espionage" activities against the UK when asked to provide evidence in the now-collapsed case against two men accused of spying for China.
